label: Professional BAS Control System
info:
Professional Data Center Building Automation System (BAS) HMI

Demonstrates:
- Industrial HVAC control expertise
- Professional alarm management
- P/I/D control theory knowledge
- Lead/Lag/Standby staging sequences
- Real-time performance monitoring
- Comprehensive KPI tracking
- Fault injection and diagnostics

Designed for portfolio demonstration to potential employers in BAS/HVAC industry.
